snippet: Steve Asmussen, the trainer of Tapiture, is being investigated over accusations of cruelty as the horse racing industry grapples with how to deal with a lingering problem.
abstract: Joe Drape On Horse Racing column notes that 140th running of the Kentucky Derby will take place against backdrop of scandal, with prominent trainer Steve Asmussen under investigation for cruelty to his horses; notes that while there has been progress on doping and abuse, racing fans are still awaiting day when they can enjoy the derby while feeling confident that the horses are well taken care of.
lead_paragraph: Steve Asmussen, the trainer of Tapiture, is being investigated over accusations of cruelty as the horse racing industry grapples with how to deal with a lingering problem.
